slap.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to hit someone with the flat part of your hand
slap.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Sarah slapped Aaron across the face.
slap.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: to put something down on a surface with force, especially when you are angry
slap.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: Giles slapped his cards down on the table.
slap.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: to hit a surface with a lot of force, making a loud sharp sound
slap.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: Small waves slapped against the side of the boat.
slap.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a quick hit with the flat part of your hand
slap.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: Julia gave Roy a slap on the cheek.
